message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product. Looking forward to your response.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $165. What do you think?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $155 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us both.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as low as $155. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $160. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to counter with an offer of $157 for the product. I hope this helps us close the gap.

I'm surprised you're still willing to negotiate, Bob! I'm not willing to budge much more, but I'll make one final offer. I'll sell the product to you for $162. This is my absolute lowest price, so I hope we can finally come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $159 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually agreeable price.

I'm getting close to giving up, Bob! I'm not willing to go any lower than $165. I've already compromised a lot, and I think this is the best I can do. If you're still interested, I'll sell the product to you for $165. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $163 for the product. I hope this is the final offer that allows us to close the deal.
